languages.text: "Она более чем в праве вершить судьбы жителей станции, но это не отменяет того факта, что происходит надругательство над правосудием. Вот, что случается, когда судьей движет не Лекс, а болезненная фанатичность".

"It is well within her right to decide the fates of the station's inhabitants, but that does not change the fact that this is a perversion of justice. This is what happens when a judge is driven by morbid fanaticism instead of the Lex."
languages.original_text: "Она более чем в праве вершить судьбы жителей станции, но это не отменяет того факта, что происходит надругательство над правосудием. Вот, что случается, когда судьей движет не Лекс, а болезненная фанатичность".

traits.locale_text: "It is well within her right to decide the fates of the station's inhabitants, but that does not change the fact that this is a perversion of justice. This is what happens when a judge is driven by morbid fanaticism instead of the Lex."

"It is well within her right to decide the fates of the station's inhabitants, but that does not change the fact that this is a perversion of justice. This is what happens when a judge is driven by morbid fanaticism instead of the Lex."

languages.text: “她确实有权决定这颗星站的命运，但即便如此，她的所作所为也依然是在歪曲正义。当仲裁者不再遵循帝国法典，任由自己被病态的狂热驱使时，就会发生这种事情。”
languages.original_text: "It is well within her right to decide the fates of the station's inhabitants, but that does not change the fact that this is a perversion of justice. This is what happens when a judge is driven by morbid fanaticism instead of the Lex."

traits.locale_text: “她确实有权决定这颗星站的命运，但即便如此，她的所作所为也依然是在歪曲正义。当仲裁者不再遵循帝国法典，任由自己被病态的狂热驱使时，就会发生这种事情。”

languages.text: «Está completamente en su derecho de decidir el destino de los habitantes de la estación, pero esto no cambia el hecho de que es una perversión de la justicia. Esto es lo que sucede cuando un juez se deja guiar por el fanatismo en vez de la Lex».
languages.original_text: "It is well within her right to decide the fates of the station's inhabitants, but that does not change the fact that this is a perversion of justice. This is what happens when a judge is driven by morbid fanaticism instead of the Lex."

traits.locale_text: «Está completamente en su derecho de decidir el destino de los habitantes de la estación, pero esto no cambia el hecho de que es una perversión de la justicia. Esto es lo que sucede cuando un juez se deja guiar por el fanatismo en vez de la Lex».

languages.text: « Elle est parfaitement autorisée à décider de l'avenir des habitants de la station, mais cela ne change rien au fait qu'il s'agisse d'une perversion de la justice. Voilà ce qui arrive quand un juge est guidé par un fanatisme macabre et non pas par la Lex. »
languages.original_text: "It is well within her right to decide the fates of the station's inhabitants, but that does not change the fact that this is a perversion of justice. This is what happens when a judge is driven by morbid fanaticism instead of the Lex."

traits.locale_text: « Elle est parfaitement autorisée à décider de l'avenir des habitants de la station, mais cela ne change rien au fait qu'il s'agisse d'une perversion de la justice. Voilà ce qui arrive quand un juge est guidé par un fanatisme macabre et non pas par la Lex. »

languages.text: 「ステーションの住民の運命を決めるのは彼女の権利の範囲内ですが、それでもこれは正義の歪みであるという事実は変わりません。これは、裁判官がレックスではなく病的な狂信に突き動かされたときに起こることです」
languages.original_text: "It is well within her right to decide the fates of the station's inhabitants, but that does not change the fact that this is a perversion of justice. This is what happens when a judge is driven by morbid fanaticism instead of the Lex."

traits.locale_text: 「ステーションの住民の運命を決めるのは彼女の権利の範囲内ですが、それでもこれは正義の歪みであるという事実は変わりません。これは、裁判官がレックスではなく病的な狂信に突き動かされたときに起こることです」

languages.text: "İstasyon sakinlerinin kaderine karar vermek onun hakkıdır ama bu, adaletin bir sapkınlığı olduğu gerçeğini değiştirmez. Bir yargıcın Lex yerine hastalıklı bir fanatizmle hareket etmesi işte böyle sonuçlanır."
languages.original_text: "It is well within her right to decide the fates of the station's inhabitants, but that does not change the fact that this is a perversion of justice. This is what happens when a judge is driven by morbid fanaticism instead of the Lex."

traits.locale_text: "İstasyon sakinlerinin kaderine karar vermek onun hakkıdır ama bu, adaletin bir sapkınlığı olduğu gerçeğini değiştirmez. Bir yargıcın Lex yerine hastalıklı bir fanatizmle hareket etmesi işte böyle sonuçlanır."

languages.text: "Sie hat durchaus das Recht, über das Schicksal der Stationsbewohner zu befinden, aber das ändert nichts an der Tatsache, dass es sich um eine Pervertierung von Gerechtigkeit handelt. So etwas geschieht, wenn Richter von morbiden Fanatismus getrieben werden anstatt vom Lex."
languages.original_text: "It is well within her right to decide the fates of the station's inhabitants, but that does not change the fact that this is a perversion of justice. This is what happens when a judge is driven by morbid fanaticism instead of the Lex."

traits.locale_text: "Sie hat durchaus das Recht, über das Schicksal der Stationsbewohner zu befinden, aber das ändert nichts an der Tatsache, dass es sich um eine Pervertierung von Gerechtigkeit handelt. So etwas geschieht, wenn Richter von morbiden Fanatismus getrieben werden anstatt vom Lex."
